data.actual_result: The bar fades away and then reappears without the user touching anything
data.expected_result: Bar should show for a brief second and then simply fade and disappear until user begins to scroll.
data.short_description: (Small visual bug) The white scroll bar in the Members list constantly fades away and re-appears even when the user is not touching it whatsoever. This only appears to happen in larger servers, rather than small ones
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a large server (This one will work fine) - Swipe the right side of the screen to open the members - Do not touch the screen - Wait for a small while as timings seems to differ and observe the white scroll bar fade and reappear without doing anything at all
